meanings.definition: To arrange or classify by category.
meanings.sent1: I will categorize my toys into different boxes.
meanings.sent2: It is important to categorize books by genre in the library.
meanings.sent3: The aliens asked me to categorize all the Earth animals for them.
meanings.sent4: She could categorize people's personalities just by looking at them.
meanings.sent5: The detective had to categorize the evidence to solve the case.

meanings.sent1: Please categorize these documents into the correct folders.
meanings.sent2: The teacher will categorize the students based on their performance.
meanings.sent3: I tried to categorize my friends into different groups for the party.
meanings.sent4: The software can categorize images based on their content.
meanings.sent5: He needed to categorize the expenses to create a budget.
